item.title: DC510 - Hackers.
item.description: DC510: Hackers. April 8, 2019 (Monday) This month’s pre-meeting drinking is the Hackers, the movie, a classic we’ve been seeing a lot of lately. It runs 107 minutes, figure on meeting up at 9:15 - 9:20

item.title: DC510 Valentines Day Heart Emoji
item.description: DC510 To Get You In The Mood Feb 11, 2018 This month’s pre-meeting drinking is the original Terminator, starring our former governor and also Michael Biehn. It runs 107 minutes, figure on meeting up at 9:10 - 9:15

item.title: DC510 - Christmas Special
item.description: DC510 - Christmas Special Dec 10, 2018 This month’s pre-meeting drinking is Burst City, a Japanese (cyber?)punk classic. The movie starts around 7:00, runs 115 minutes, basically figure on meeting up at like 9:05-9:15. Email us if you’re running late and want us to stick around to see you.

item.title: DC510 - November Meeting
item.description: DC510 - November Meeting Nov 12, 2018 This month's pre-meeting drinking is Aliens, a film we all know by heart. The movie starts around 7:00, runs maybe 137 minutes depending on which cut they use, basically figure on meeting up at like 9:15-9:20. Email us if you're running late and want us to stick around to see you.

item.title: DC510 - Spooktober Meeting
item.description: DC510 - Spooktober Meeting Oct 8, 2018 This month's pre-meeting drinking will feature a not-spooky movie, Total Recall. Yeah, we're sad that it's not Hardware. The movie starts at 7:00, runs 113 minutes, so figure on meeting up at like 9:10-9:20. Email or dm us if you're running late and want us to stick around to see you.

item.title: DC510 - August Meeting
item.description: DC510 - August Meeting Aug 24, 2018 We're doing a meeting to make up for the one we missed thanks to the con! Location: The Lawn at the Corner of Lake Merritt Drive and Lakeside Drive in Oakland (You can walk from the Lake Merritt BART) We'll be gathering from 8:30 - 9:00 PM, and then walking somewhere else. Do you know where? Tell us!

item.title: DC510 - June Meeting
item.description: DC510 - June Meeting June 11, 2018 Knockout SF (3223 Mission St, walking distance of the 24th Street BART) The Movie (some episodes of Serial Experiments Lain) starts at 6:30, includes some opener, and runs a while. DC510 will be at the bar until 9:00, when we'll start the meeting proper.

item.title: DC510 - April Meeting
item.description: DC510 - April Meeting April 9, 2018 Knockout SF (3223 Mission St, walking distance of the 24th Street BART) The Movie (Sneakers) starts at 6:30, includes some opener, runs 126 minutes, and will probably end around 9:20-9:30.

item.title: DC510 - March Meeting
item.description:
DC510 - March Meeting March 12, 2018 Knockout SF (3223 Mission St, walking distance of the 24th Street BART) The Movie (They Live) starts at 6:30, includes some opener, runs 94 minutes, and will probably end around 9:00-9:10.
Bring your sunglasses.

item.title: DC510 - February Meeting
item.description:
DC510 - February Meeting February 12, 2018 Knockout SF (3223 Mission St, walking distance of the 24th Street BART) The Movie (Zero Theorem) starts at 6:30, includes some opener, runs 111 minutes, and will probably end around 9:00-9:10.
Also, we updated our mailing address!
